scenario_text.value: What’s this... An origami gold medal?
Why?! Why the hell is that here?!
Oh, so this is yours, Ryo? Here you go.

...Why the heck is this here? It should be
back in my room at home...

This is...the first thing my mother ever gave
me.

I helped her with something back when I was
a kid. She gave this to me for my hard work.

I was so, so happy when I got it. But then my
mother’s health got worse, so...

*sniff* Aw, Mommy... I wish you could’ve said
more nice things to me...
